properties.title: Maven Plugin for Castor XML code generator
properties.author: Werner Guttmann

release.action: Added option to specify separate output directory for generated resources.
Added option to allow usage of Velocity code generation.
Added property to allow generation of mapping files.
Added property to allow generation of JDO descriptors.
Removed hard-coding of schema directory for Clover runs.
Upgraded dependency to Castor to 1.2 and 1.3.
Upgraded dependency to Castor to 1.2 and 1.3.
Fixed handling of imported schemas during generation.
Eased requirement to require a castor.properties to be present.
